https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eiVQORVyVuNNZHPAELuWtlXoQsD.jpg A mysterious new villain known only as Hush uses a gallery of villains to destroy Batman's crime-fighting career as well as Bruce Wayne's personal life, which has been further complicated by a relationship with Selina Kyle/Catwoman.
